definitions.definition: Neither sexual nor romantic in nature; being or exhibiting platonic love .
examples: They are good friends, but their relationship is strictly platonic .

definitions.definition: Alternative letter-case form of Platonic ( of or relating to the philosophical views of Plato and his successors ) .

main_definition: Neither sexual nor romantic in nature; being or exhibiting platonic love .
secondary_definitions: Alternative letter-case form of Platonic ( of or relating to the philosophical views of Plato and his successors ) .
